messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a pack of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Lisssten up there isss a cultissst who will be ironicly hanging out in chappel if he capturesss anyone or you(if you can comunicate) without consssent we will kill the fuck if you sssee him preformin magic and ssshit without an anoucment tell usss we kill the fuck but he isss going to be doin sssome creepy ssshit in there ssso unlesss you want tingsss to get ssspoopy ssstay away alssso he isss fine to roam and the chap isss with him asss backup if it goesss titsss up

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alssso i forgot to sssay you can join hisss cult with consssent

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.
